categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Ord Biniir was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories.
The planet originally was colonized by the Galactic Republic as a Ordnance/Regional Depot some time circa 12,000 BBY.
During the Cold War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, an influential General was hiring an individual to remove a few precarious objects from his personal estate.
Ord Biniir was in Separatist space during the Clone Wars. The Jedi Sha'a Gi hailed from this planet.
During the Galactic Civil War, it became the site of the Battle of Ord Biniir.
It was later conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong.
